Consumable.Name: Chronopotion
Consumable.Description: A shimmering liquid that seems to flow backwards, granting the drinker brief foresight.
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Used by the Chronoguardians to anticipate enemy movements in crucial battles.

Consumable.Name: Ethereal Mist
Consumable.Description: A bottle of dense fog that, when released, cloaks the user in an almost invisible sheath.
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Extracted from the Ethereal Plane, used by spies for unseen passage.

Consumable.Name: Void Shard
Consumable.Description: A fragment of the void, pulsating with raw, uncontrolled energy.
Consumable.Effects: Casts a shield that absorbs damage
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: The essence of destroyed realities, utilized in desperate times to turn the tide of battle.
